summary: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.
cast: Lauren Bacall|Josh Hutcherson|Alfred Molina|Billy Boyd|Dina Eastwood|Adam Godley|Scott Eastwood|Alexandra Carl|Hayden Panettiere|Tricia Helfer|Kim Myers|Jansen Panettiere|José Zúñiga|Zuhair Haddad|Robert Harvey|Ralph Peduto|Kean Matthams|Alexander Poletti|Alexandra Malek|Myles Williams|Wolfgang Roeck|Stephen Rana|Laurence S. Chess|Carrie I. Dodd|Brad Dirk Martin
title: The Forger
